title: Front-end
descrption: my expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript goes beyond mere familiarity. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality web solutions, I possess the necessary skills to create visually appealing, user-friendly, and interactive websites while adhering to industry standards and best practices

title: Back-end
descrption: I also have proficiency in back-end development, specifically in Java, C#, and Python. With a focus on building robust and scalable server-side solutions, I have experience in Sql and Oracle. By leveraging my front-end and back-end skills together, I am able to develop end-to-end web applications that deliver seamless user experiences

title: OOP
descrption: I have a solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and practices. With proficiency in Java, C#, or Python, I employ encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism to design modular and maintainable code. By leveraging the power of OOP, I create robust software architectures and reusable components that promote code reusability, scalability, and extensibility

title: Graphic Design
descrption: I also have some experience with graphic design tools such as Photoshop and Illustrator. I can utilize these tools to create basic graphics, edit images, and make necessary adjustments to enhance the visual aspects of Pictures.
